===Etymology===
Compound of {{com|ja|炭|素|tr1=tan|t1=[[coal]]|tr2=so|t2=[[element]]|sort=たんそ}}, {{cal|ja|sort=たんそ|etyl lang=nl|etyl term=koolstof|etyl t=[[carbon]]; [[coal]][[stuff]]|nocap=y}}. Compare also {{cog|de|Kohlenstoff}}, {{cog|lb|Kuelestoff}}, {{cog|da|kulstof}}.

Considered to be used first in [[w:Udagawa Yōan|Udagawa Yōan]]'s (宇田川榕菴, 1798 – 1846) book ''Introduction to Chemistry'' ({{lang|ja|舎密開宗}}, ''Seimi Kaisō''), a compilation of various scientific books in {{etyl|nl|-}}.

===Pronunciation===

{{ja-noun|たんそ}}

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{l|ja|炭素鋼}} (''tansokō''): carbon steel
* {{l|ja|炭素税}} (''tansozei''): carbon tax
* {{l|ja|炭素繊維}} (''tanso sen'i''): carbon fiber
* {{l|ja|炭素中立}} (''tanso chūritsu''): carbon-neutral
* {{l|ja|炭素１４}}, {{l|ja|炭素一四}} (''tanso jūshi''): carbon-14
* {{l|ja|炭素１４法}}, {{l|ja|炭素一四法}} (''tanso jūshihō''): carbon-14 dating
* {{l|ja|炭素クレジット}} (''tanso kurejitto''): carbon credit
* {{l|ja|炭素化合物}} (''tanso kagōbutsu''): carbon compounds
* {{l|ja|高炭素鋼}} (''kōtansokō''): high-carbon steel
* {{l|ja|含水炭素}} (''gansui tanso''): carbohydrate
* {{l|ja|酸化炭素}} (''sanka tanso''): carbon oxide
* {{l|ja|一酸化炭素}} (''issanka tanso''): carbon monoxide
{{der-mid}}
* {{l|ja|四塩化炭素}} (''shienka tanso''): carbon tetrachloride
* {{l|ja|次酸化炭素}} (''jisanka tanso''): carbon suboxide
* {{l|ja|二酸化炭素}} (''nisanka tanso''): carbon dioxide
* {{l|ja|二硫化炭素}} (''niryūka tanso''): carbon disulfide
* {{l|ja|放射性炭素}} (''hōshasei tanso''): radiocarbon
* {{l|ja|無定形炭素}} (''muteikei tanso''): amorphous carbon
* {{l|ja|一酸化炭素中毒}} (''issanka tanso chūdoku''): carbon monoxide poisoning
* {{l|ja|二酸化炭素排出権}} (''nisanka tanso-haishutsuken''): right to emit carbon dioxide
* {{l|ja|二酸化炭素削減義務}} (''nisanka tanso sakugen gimu''): carbon dioxide reducing obligation
* {{l|ja|二酸化炭素削減目標}} (''nisanka tanso sakugen mokuhyō''): CO2-reduction goal
* {{l|ja|放射性炭素年代測定}} (''hōshasei tanso nendai sokutei''): radiocarbon dating
